summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated August 6, 2019, discussing the drafting of a response to defense preservation requests in the Jeffrey Epstein case. It references attached letters and coordination with a colleague.

events.title: Email regarding draft response to defense
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney sends an email coordinating the drafting of a response to defense preservation requests in the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 6, 2019, from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
It discusses drafting a response to defense preservation requests in the Jeffrey Epstein case.
It references attached defense letters from July 26, 2019, and August 1, 2019, and a draft response dated August 5, 2019.
The email indicates coordination with a colleague (M) on the language of the response.
